metadata.title: CVE-2021-23225 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti 1.1.38 allows authenticated users with User Management permissions toinject arbitrary web script or HTML in the "new_username" field duringcreation of a new user via "Copy" method at user_admin.php.

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
